pages.text: Right click on any filterable block to change it's filter settings. Works with <li><l>(transport/input)High Pressure Input</l><li><l>(transport/output)High Pressure Output</l><li><l>(transport/pump)High Pressure Pump</l><li><l>(transport/drain)Fluid Drain</l><li><l>(tank/filter)Tank Fluid Filter</l>

In the GUI text field on top can be used to search for fluids. You can mouse over fluid icons to see their name. Clicking on a fluid icon will set the filter, while clicking the X button will remove the filter setting.
